EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, #HumansOfLDN is almost here! DETAILS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey Grads,
Thanks for signing up to to Humans of London with Regional Youth Board! This email will let you know all the details for the day and what you need to bring.
Being part of #HumansOfLDN, you will be helping to find out about how socially mixed London really is in comparison to New York. The day will consist of discussions, conversations and debates about how socially mixed London truly is, engaging with members of the public around Piccadilly Circus.
Being involved in this social action project means you have earned free tickets for the NCS Action Day celebration event and gig taking place in Conway Hall after your project from 4pm to 8pm! You will be travelling from Piccadilly Circus to Conway Hall with your mentor.
This project will take place between 11am to 3pm. Everyone will be meeting at Conway Hall at 10:45am
Please bring some lunch and your oysters with some money to put on them as you will be travelling from Piccadilly Circus to Holborn for the celebration event.
Address: Meeting point, Conway Hall - 25 Red Lion Square, London WC1R 4RL
Your mentor on the day will be: Ola - 07785 623395
This is the number you can contact on the day if you need to. If you have any questions regarding the day please free feel to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org
Looking forward to seeing you all there!
The Core Grad Team
